data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in North Dakota, United States to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Dakota, United States
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of North Dakota a passion to plant another simple church.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 201,691 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of North Dakota to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mongol, Khalka people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, help the 201,691 believers in North Dakota to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who are far from you in North Dakota. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in North Dakota, United States.
